title: Develop a Sustainability (ESG) Strategy
description: An agent must draft a basic ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) strategy for a client.

tasks.description: Brainstorm initiatives for the 'Environmental' pillar (e.g., 'reduce carbon footprint', 'implement recycling program').
Brainstorm initiatives for the 'Social' pillar (e.g., 'improve employee diversity', 'community volunteering program').
Brainstorm initiatives for the 'Governance' pillar (e.g., 'increase board transparency', 'implement ethics training').
Compile the brainstormed ideas into a structured ESG strategy document.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a report outlining the proposed ESG strategy.
